citations.narrative:
This facility's annual contingency plan review has not been documented since June 27, 2023. Each registrant must
maintain documentation of their annual contingency plan reviews, including documenting any amendments or changes
made since the previous year's review. Failure to maintain documentation of contingency plan reviews prevents APHIS
officials from verifying that the plan has been reviewed annually. The facility must ensure that documentation of the
contingency plan annual review is maintained and made available to APHIS upon request. Correct by July 28, 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.38(l)(2) 
   
Miscellaneous. 
This facility's annual contingency plan review has not been documented since June 27, 2023. Each registrant must 
maintain documentation of their annual contingency plan reviews, including documenting any amendments or changes 
made since the previous year's review. Failure to maintain documentation of contingency plan reviews prevents APHIS 
officials from verifying that the plan has been reviewed annually. The facility must ensure that documentation of the 
contingency plan annual review is maintained and made available to APHIS upon request. Correct by July 28, 2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
